Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class CardDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CardDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Playable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AthenaCardDecorator, ChronusCardDecorator, HeraCardDecorator
public abstract class CardDecorator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Playable
This class is the model of a Card decorator. We does not modify any behaviour of wrappee.

  • Constructor Details

    • CardDecorator

      public CardDecorator​(Card component)

  • Method Details

    • attach

      public Playable attach​(Card component)
      Attach this decorator instance to a Card. This means wrapping Card#decorator, which could be another CardDecorator. Substantially we are performing an addition to a circular linked list.
      Parameters:
      component - A Card
      Returns:
      The Playable that will be wrapped by this instance

    • detach

      public void detach()
      Detach this decorator instance from a Card. Substantially we are performing an subtraction to a circular linked list.

    • selectWorker

      public void selectWorker​(Worker worker)
      Select a Worker between those owned by the current player. This worker will be the one to move and build in the next phases.
      Specified by:
      selectWorker in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      worker - The worker indicated for selection

    • move

      public void move​(Tile destinationTile)
      Move the selected Worker to the specified tile. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToMove.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      destinationTile - The Tile where the worker is going to be moved to

    • build

      public void build​(Tile builtTile)
      Base decorator does not modify any behaviour of its wrappee. Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome. This tile must be included in the result set of Playable#getTilesToBuild.
      Specified by:
      build in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      builtTile - The Tile where the worker will build

    • useGodPower

      public void useGodPower​(boolean isUsed)
      Reacts to the player's manifest choice of using/not using this Card godpower. The specific actions done vary from card to card. Not all cards actually use this method.
      Specified by:
      useGodPower in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      isUsed - Indicates if the godpower will be used this turn.

    • getTilesToMove

      public java.util.List<Tile> getTilesToMove​(Tile tile)
      Generate all possible moves from a starting Tile taking into account this Card rules of movement.
      Specified by:
      getTilesToMove in interface Playable
      Parameters:
      tile - The tile where the worker is currently placed
      Returns:

    • getTilesToMove
